title: We Ballin’
lyrics: Uh, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, what
Uh-huh
Now I'm the one that you call when it's time to ball
When I'm with my West Coast G's, it's a three-peat, y'all
Game on lock from the top of the key
Murs, Quik and Jay Rock, it's hot, we hit for three
We here, meant to be, no fear for enemies
You feel the energy? We're near infinity – we timeless
Rhymes just find us to speak through
About to put the full court press on your weak crew
You can't defend, you fake, you so pretend
It's up and going in, now watch me go for ten
Star in my own right, you better play your zone tight
'Cause when I'm in my zone, you know I'm going all night
Shoot the lights out, mustard out the hot dog
Who else supposed to heat the game up? 'Cause it's not y'all
Legend like Chick Hearn
When will these kids learn?
You touch an NBA Live wire and get burned
Every time you see us, yeah we ballin', ballin'
Ladies going crazy, now they callin', callin'
Living life perfect, now we flawless, flawless
Y'all in trouble once we hop up on the hustle
Every time you see us, yeah we ballin', ballin'
Ladies going crazy, now they callin', callin' (Yeah)
Living life perfect, now we flawless, flawless (Yeah, yeah)
Y'all in trouble once we hop up on the hustle (Let's go, yeah)
It's Jay Rock, you can't stop the dribble
Cheerleaders love it how I penetrate the middle
I maneuver cross-country now, I'm nice
Young scrub like Bub, I'll shoot out your lights
Used to ride rugged, now I ride plush
You ride the bench, I ride GT's and up
White T's sometimes, my three peat's the tux
I'm cool like five ice cubes in my cup
Ballin' out of control, like an offensive foul
Charge in the hole, you should know my style
Get on a hater nerves like a root canal
Listen, my roots, I'm the truth, you should wipe me down
Matter fact, you should follow my word
I'm in a merging lane with Murs looking for hers – attention
Drenchin' Benjamins, make it rain like a hurricane
Big footprints, so you know I came
Every time you see us, yeah we ballin', ballin'
Ladies going crazy, now they callin', callin'
Living life perfect, now we flawless, flawless
Y'all in trouble once we hop up on the hustle
Every time you see us, yeah we ballin', ballin'
Ladies going crazy, now they callin', callin'
Living life perfect, now we flawless, flawless
Y'all in trouble once we hop up on the hustle
Yeah – I'm all net, that boy wet
Jerry West, the West best, I'm the best from the West and don't forget
Hard to stop, towering like a mountain top
Get your ankles broke, left in smoke, turn around, pop
Swish, I'm serving like your favorite dish
I'm energized to vaporize your weak defense
Offensive thrust, boss like Jerry Buss
All action, Phil Jackson, the team to beat's us
Me, I'm like Obi-Wan Kenobi, Kobe Bryant
Hard to see 'cause I can hit threes without even trying
I'm magic like Earvin Johnson, serve like Julius Erving
Dwight Howard, I'm powered, I'm powerful, I'm a surgeon
Picking apart teams operatin' on the court
Like heart surgeons, "in the game," EA Sports
I'm breaking down this person in the paint with force
I'm trauma, I'm drama, I'ma win the game in the fourth
I'm Paul Pierce, I'm fierce, I'm the one, I'm LeBron
I'm bomb, I'm napalm, I'm the reason why we won
It's hard to lose when you got a team like mine
It's hard to win up against a regime like mine
We ready for war, Stormtrooper, super-duper shaker
Natural hooper on 'em like Doctor J gettin' Cooper
Make no mistakes when your ankle breaks
You got no hops, you ball like you got ankle weights on
